import React, {useState} from 'react' export const LinkForm = (props) => { const initialStateValues = { name: "", username: "", email: "", clave: "", } const [values, setValues] = useState(initialStateValues); const handleInputChange = (e) =>{ const {name, value} = e.target; setValues({...values, [name]: value}) } const handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); console.log(values) props.add(values); } return (
create
face
email
lock
) }; export default LinkForm;
